scripts.update:all: npm run update:other3 && npm run update:other4 && npm run update:v1 && npm run update:v2 && npm run update:v3 && npm run update:v3_old && npm run update:v3d8 && npm run update:v4 && npm run update:v4_old && npm run update:v4d6
scripts.build:all: npm run build:other3 && npm run build:other4 && npm run build:v1 && npm run build:v2 && npm run build:v3 && npm run build:v3_old && npm run build:v3d8 && npm run build:v4 && npm run build:v4_old && npm run build:v4d6
scripts.pack:other3: npm run build:other3 && gulp build_other3_docs && gulp build_other3_zip
scripts.pack:other4: npm run build:other4 && gulp build_other4_docs && gulp build_other4_zip
scripts.pack:v1: npm run build:v1 && gulp build_v1_docs && gulp build_v1_zip
scripts.pack:v2: npm run build:v2 && gulp build_v2_docs && gulp build_v2_zip
scripts.pack:v3: npm run build:v3 && gulp build_v3_docs && gulp build_v3_zip
scripts.pack:v3_old: npm run build:v3_old && gulp build_v3_old_docs && gulp build_v3_old_zip
scripts.pack:v3d8: npm run build:v3d8 && gulp build_v3d8_docs && gulp build_v3d8_zip
scripts.pack:v4: npm run build:v4 && gulp build_v4_docs && gulp build_v4_zip
scripts.pack:v4_old: npm run build:v4_old && gulp build_v4_old_docs && gulp build_v4_old_zip
scripts.pack:v4d6: npm run build:v4d6 && gulp build_v4d6_docs && gulp build_v4d6_zip
scripts.pack:all: npm run build:all && gulp build_all_docs && gulp build_all_zip
